sn35.118:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
sn35.118:1.2: Atha kho sakko devanamindo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho sakko devanamindo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.118:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti?
sn35.118:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti?
sn35.118:2.1: “Santi kho, devanaminda, cakkhuvinneyya rupa, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.118:2.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.118:2.3: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.118:3.2: santi kho, devanaminda, manovinneyya dhamma, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.118:3.3: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.118:3.4: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.118:3.6: Ayam kho, devanaminda, hetu, ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti.
sn35.118:4.1: Santi ca kho, devanaminda, cakkhuvinneyya rupa, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.118:4.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.118:4.3: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam vinnanam hoti, na tadupadanam.
sn35.118:5.2: santi kho, devanaminda, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.118:5.3: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.118:5.4: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam vinnanam hoti na tadupadanam.
sn35.118:5.6: Ayam kho, devanaminda, hetu, ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti.
